text:
A general view southward from No. 1 Hanson Place, the Williamsburg Savings Bank Building. The broad, white thoroughfare running across the face of the view is Flatbush Avenue, with the B. M. T. "El" on it (foreground) turning in on Fifth Avenue. On the left is Atlantic Avenue and the Long Island Railroad yards between the latter and Pacific Street.

May 12, 1939
Views 1,2,3

P. L. Sperr
title: General View - Brooklyn - Flatbush Avenue.
